meta_description: EXHIBITIONS On View at the Museum LEARN MORE What's Happening Events at the Museum Learn More Project ARTSTART Education Program Learn More Give Please join us as we continue to share Claremont’s rich artistic legacy and encourage the artists of today and tomorrow in our home in the historic Claremont Depot. Make a Donation WANT
hours_text:
**LOCATION & CONTACT INFORMATION**

200 W. First Street, Claremont, CA 91711  
in the Claremont Depot  
(909) 621-3200  
[info@claremontmuseum.org](mailto:info@claremontmuseum.org)

**MUSEUM HOURS**

Thursday, 12-4 pm  
Friday, 12–7 pm  
Saturday, 12–4 pm  
Sunday, 10 am– 4 pm

**ACCESSIBILITY**

CLMA is wheelchair accessible and has handicap parking for those with handicap permits. Accessible bathrooms are available. Please ask for assistance at the front desk.

**PARKING**

Free parking is available in the Claremont Village and in the Metrolink parking lot located on the east side of the Claremont Depot.

**PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION**

The Claremont stop on the [Metrolink](https://metrolinktrains.com/) unloads passengers directly behind the historic Claremont Depot. The CLMA entrance is on the north side of the Claremont Depot, facing First Street.

CLMA is located next to two Foothill Transit bus stops, with four additional transit stops less than a block away from the CLMA. For additional information, schedules, and transportation accommodations please visit [Claremont Transit Center](http://foothilltransit.org/lines-and-schedules/transit-centers/claremont-transcenter/)
